name: FNF - Minus Trio (TEST)
description:
FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN - MINUS TRIO (TEST)

Welcome to the page of this little program where you can mess with FNF Minus BF's. 

I may update this program sometimes to be sure to check for updates!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Up, Left, Down, Right

1 - Beta Boyfriend

2 - Mean Boyfriend

3 - Blue Boyfriend

Space - Bopeebo Pose

Ctrl - Thunder

CREDITS:
